name: Kanban Board
description:
Kanban Board right on your Figma file.

How to use it?
1. Find "Column" layer on "Components" page.
2. Put it on your page. Use column as many as you want. I suggest you to create your own Kanban page, so it's going to be your project management playground.
3. Duplicate instance named "Card" to create item inside the column.
4. Column is powered by auto layout. Feel free to drag the Card to each Column.

Change log:
17 August 2020
- Named unamed layer
